Looking for someone to buy a fully functional  SaaS app.


What does it do?
Professionally built SaaS app, with a beautiful marketing site. 

Growbeam is a modern cloud-based applicant tracking system that allows you to easily track and manage your hiring process all in one place. Post job openings, source and manage candidates and use analytics to make good hiring decisions with your team.

Check out the marketing website and then ask me any questions:

http://growbeam.com

This is a fully functional product that needs someone to take it to the next level with investing some time in marketing and sales.

Please contact me if you are serious about this and I will be happy to run you through a demo of the product and answer any questions you may have.


Features

  • Customised hiring stages for each department
  • Organise phone screens & interviews using the in built two-way email sync.
  • Customized hiring teams/committees
  • Resumes and cover letters are automatically scanned and turned into rich candidate profiles.
  • Hiring team/committee automatically notified by changes to a candidate
  • Analytics on everything
  • Beautiful marketing site
  • Create careers site, or just embed application form
  • Short share code (http://grbm.co)


SKILLS & REQUIREMENTS

You are:

  • Serious about purchasing a fully functional product
  • An entrepreneur, marketeer, developer or sales person looking for a could opportunity

item.title: New User Registration Email To Site Owner
item.content:encoded:
New User Notification Site Owner

Hello! New user registration on your site [SITE_NAME]:

Username: [NEW_USER_USERNAME] Email: [NEW_USER_EMAIL]

® [SITE_NAME], 2016

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: New User Registration Email To Site Owner
This template is used for sending email to site owner when a normal user/candiate/employer register.

item.title: Job Applied Notfication for Candidate
item.content:encoded:
Job Applied Notfication for Candidate

Employer name: [EMPLOYER_NAME]Candidate email: [CANDIDATE_EMAIL]
Job Title: [JOB_TITLE]Job url: [JOB_URL]
® [SITE_NAME], 2016

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: This template is used sending email when job applied successfully

item.title: Job Applied Notfication for Employer
item.content:encoded:
Job Applied Notfication for Employer

Candidate name: [CANDIDATE_NAME]Candidate email: [CANDIDATE_EMAIL]
Job Title: [JOB_TITLE]Job url: [JOB_URL]
® [SITE_NAME], 2016

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: This Template is used for sending email to employer when candidate apply job

item.title: Job Update Email Template
item.content:encoded:
Job Update Email Template

Hi [EMPLOYER_NAME],
Your Job [JOB_ID_NUMBER] has been Updated!
® [SITE_NAME], 2016

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Job update emails are sent to the employer when his/her posted job is updated

item.title: Job Approved Email Template
item.content:encoded:
Job Approved Email Template

Hello [JOB_USER_NAME]! Your Job "[JOB_TITLE]" has been approved.
[JOB_LINK]
® [SITE_NAME], 2016

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: This Template is used for sending email to employer when job status approved

item.title: Job not Approved Email Template
item.content:encoded:
Job not Approved Email Template

Hello [JOB_USER_NAME]! Your Job "[JOB_TITLE]" is not approved.
[JOB_LINK]
® [SITE_NAME], 2016

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: This template is used for sending email to employer when job does not get approved by admin.

item.title: Job Waiting After Payment
item.content:encoded:
Job Waiting Email Template

Hi [EMPLOYER_NAME],
Your Payment has been received and posted Job "[JOB_ID_NUMBER]" is currently being reviewed
® [SITE_NAME], 2016

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Job waiting emails are sent to the employer when the payment is successfull but job is not active by admin

item.title: Delete Job Email Template
item.content:encoded:
Delete Job

Hello [JOB_USER_NAME]!
Your Job "[JOB_TITLE]" is Delete successfully.
® [SITE_NAME], 2016

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: This template is used to sending email to employer when employer delete job.

item.title: Approved Employer Profile
item.content:encoded:
Approved Employer Profile

Hello [EMPLOYER_NAME]! Your profile has been approved successfully.

® [SITE_NAME], 2016

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: This template is used to sending email when employer Status approved

item.title: Not Approved Candidate Profile
item.content:encoded:
Not Approved Candidate Profile

Hello [CANDIDATE_NAME]! Your profile is not approved.

® [SITE_NAME], 2016

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: This template is used to sending email when candidate Status not approved

item.title: Approved Candidate Profile
item.content:encoded:
Approved Candidate Profile

Hello [CANDIDATE_NAME]! Your profile has been approved successfully.

® [SITE_NAME], 2016

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: This template is used to sending email when candidate Status approved

item.title: Not Approved Employer Profile
item.content:encoded:
Not Approved Employer Profile

Hello [EMPLOYER_NAME]! Your profile is not approved.

® [SITE_NAME], 2016

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: This template is used to sending email when employer Status not approved

item.title: Employer Register
item.content:encoded:
Employer Register

Hello! Register Successfully. Below is your username and password.
User Name: [EMPLOYER_REGISTERED_NAME]
User Password: [EMPLOYER_REGISTERED_PASSWORD]
® [SITE_NAME], 2016

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: This template is used for sending email when employer register.

item.title: Candidate Register
item.content:encoded:
Candidate Register

Hello! Register Successfully. Below is your username and password.
User Name: [CANDIDATE_REGISTERED_NAME]
User Password: [CANDIDATE_REGISTERED_PASSWORD]
® [SITE_NAME], 2016

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: This template is used for sending email to candidate when candidate register.

item.title: job alert
item.content:encoded:
Job Alert

Hello! Following are the jobs for which you have subscribed at [SITE_NAME]
Job Alert Title: [JOB_ALERT_TITLE]
[JOB_ALERT_JOBS_LIST]
All Jobs Listing Link: [JOB_ALERT_FULL_LISTING_URL]
Jobs Count: [JOB_ALERT_TOTAL_JOBS_COUNT]
Alert Frequency: [JOB_ALERT_FREQUENCY]
To unsubscribe job alert: [JOB_ALERT_UNSUBSCRIBE_LINK]
® [SITE_NAME], 2016

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: This template will be used when sending a job alert, Template will have a list of jobs as per user set filters.

item.title: C Developer .Net Software House
item.dc:creator: jobcareer-admin
item.content:encoded:
SAF is looking for a wordpress & digital media admin to handle all the digital media account management, best of theblog writing and social media. The candidate will be responsible to manage the news articles in wordpress websites, Write articles/blogs with excellent English reading/writing skills, handle all aspects of social media accounts (Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, YouTube etc), including content development. Candidate will be responsible to manage the news articles in wordpress websites, write articles/blogs with excellent English reading/writing skills, handle all aspects of social media accounts (Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, YouTube etc), including content development, daily posting, monitoring.
Skills Required
  • Skills combined with deep interest and enthusiasm for social media, blogging and technology.
  • Self-starter, demonstrating initiative and good team player.
  • Strong knowledge of HTML, CSS and HTML/Email/Newsletter document.
  • Strong knowledge of WordPress article and content creation
  • Manage social media campaigns and day to day activities.
  • Write editorial content, blog and newsletterts.
  • Send monthly or bi-monthly newsletter (emails) to subscribers.
  • Response of newsletter emails using Google Analytics.
  • Engagement content (including graphics art work).
  • Engage in conversations and answer questions on social media
  • Create and maintain a social media posting schedule.
  • Monitor trends in social media.
  • Understand how the social media impacts search traffic.
We can offer you
  • Salary of up to 25.13/hr, paid weekly including holiday pay
  • Free uniform & PVG check when joining
  • Agreed mileage payments for most clients
  • Free ongoing training through credits earned as you work
  • Smartphone app to manage your availability, bookings and payslips
  • 24-hour support contact centre, open 365 days a year

item.title: Application Developer For Android
item.dc:creator: jobcareer-admin
item.content:encoded:
SAF is looking for a wordpress & digital media admin to handle all the digital media account management, best of theblog writing and social media. The candidate will be responsible to manage the news articles in wordpress websites, Write articles/blogs with excellent English reading/writing skills, handle all aspects of social media accounts (Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, YouTube etc), including content development. Candidate will be responsible to manage the news articles in wordpress websites, write articles/blogs with excellent English reading/writing skills, handle all aspects of social media accounts (Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, YouTube etc), including content development, daily posting, monitoring.
Skills Required
  • Skills combined with deep interest and enthusiasm for social media, blogging and technology.
  • Self-starter, demonstrating initiative and good team player.
  • Strong knowledge of HTML, CSS and HTML/Email/Newsletter document.
  • Strong knowledge of WordPress article and content creation
  • Manage social media campaigns and day to day activities.
  • Write editorial content, blog and newsletterts.
  • Send monthly or bi-monthly newsletter (emails) to subscribers.
  • Response of newsletter emails using Google Analytics.
  • Engagement content (including graphics art work).
  • Engage in conversations and answer questions on social media
  • Create and maintain a social media posting schedule.
  • Monitor trends in social media.
  • Understand how the social media impacts search traffic.
We can offer you
  • Salary of up to 25.13/hr, paid weekly including holiday pay
  • Free uniform & PVG check when joining
  • Agreed mileage payments for most clients
  • Free ongoing training through credits earned as you work
  • Smartphone app to manage your availability, bookings and payslips
  • 24-hour support contact centre, open 365 days a year

item.title: Budget Center Analyst Manger
item.dc:creator: jobcareer-admin
item.content:encoded:
SAF is looking for a wordpress & digital media admin to handle all the digital media account management, best of theblog writing and social media. The candidate will be responsible to manage the news articles in wordpress websites, Write articles/blogs with excellent English reading/writing skills, handle all aspects of social media accounts (Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, YouTube etc), including content development. Candidate will be responsible to manage the news articles in wordpress websites, write articles/blogs with excellent English reading/writing skills, handle all aspects of social media accounts (Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, YouTube etc), including content development, daily posting, monitoring.
Skills Required
  • Skills combined with deep interest and enthusiasm for social media, blogging and technology.
  • Self-starter, demonstrating initiative and good team player.
  • Strong knowledge of HTML, CSS and HTML/Email/Newsletter document.
  • Strong knowledge of WordPress article and content creation
  • Manage social media campaigns and day to day activities.
  • Write editorial content, blog and newsletterts.
  • Send monthly or bi-monthly newsletter (emails) to subscribers.
  • Response of newsletter emails using Google Analytics.
  • Engagement content (including graphics art work).
  • Engage in conversations and answer questions on social media
  • Create and maintain a social media posting schedule.
  • Monitor trends in social media.
  • Understand how the social media impacts search traffic.
We can offer you
  • Salary of up to 25.13/hr, paid weekly including holiday pay
  • Free uniform & PVG check when joining
  • Agreed mileage payments for most clients
  • Free ongoing training through credits earned as you work
  • Smartphone app to manage your availability, bookings and payslips
  • 24-hour support contact centre, open 365 days a year

item.title: An Overworked Newspaper Editor
item.dc:creator: jobcareer-admin
item.content:encoded:
Ravenously while stridently coughed far promiscuously below jeez much yikes bland that salamander cunningly some over abhorrent as house with between ouch that well scurrilously alas capybara massive outdid oh said hello majestically roadrunner lobster much bled alas lighted together waved upheld more far woolly ahead darn far far bore far far saw baneful upset rebound bowed possessive before or indisputably against. After hamster hello less far astride where accordingly much because some far innocently invoked far pre-set or objective this pangolin tendentiously eagle near spread and overlay as abysmal a and before walrus much therefore some close victorious jeepers deeply forward while jeez and overlaid save hey ritually notwithstanding mounted about nonchalantly and less hence far like hey kissed. Hello impotent ravenous hey accordingly well much lopsidedly one far blinked lorikeet sternly futile jeepers strewed well following subconscious far on egregiously and away far alas much forward in but far opposite less editorial some together.

Simple answer is, because other candidates wont.

Ravenously while stridently coughed far promiscuously below jeez much yikes bland that salamander cunningly some over abhorrent as house with between ouch that well scurrilously alas capybara massive outdid oh said hello majestically roadrunner lobster much bled alas lighted together waved upheld. item.title: Experience Writing For Producing a Newscast
item.dc:creator: jobcareer-admin
item.content:encoded:
Ravenously while stridently coughed far promiscuously below jeez much yikes bland that salamander cunningly some over abhorrent as house with between ouch that well scurrilously alas capybara massive outdid oh said hello majestically roadrunner lobster much bled alas lighted together waved upheld more far woolly ahead darn far far bore far far saw baneful upset rebound bowed possessive before or indisputably against. After hamster hello less far astride where accordingly much because some far innocently invoked far pre-set or objective this pangolin tendentiously eagle near spread and overlay as abysmal a and before walrus much therefore some close victorious jeepers deeply forward while jeez and overlaid save hey ritually notwithstanding mounted about nonchalantly and less hence far like hey kissed. Hello impotent ravenous hey accordingly well much lopsidedly one far blinked lorikeet sternly futile jeepers strewed well following subconscious far on egregiously and away far alas much forward in but far opposite less editorial some together.

Simple answer is, because other candidates wont.

Ravenously while stridently coughed far promiscuously below jeez much yikes bland that salamander cunningly some over abhorrent as house with between ouch that well scurrilously alas capybara massive outdid oh said hello majestically roadrunner lobster much bled alas lighted together waved upheld. Simple answer is, because other candidates wont.

item.title: Looking for a Highly Motivated Producer to Build
item.dc:creator: jobcareer-admin
item.content:encoded:
Ravenously while stridently coughed far promiscuously below jeez much yikes bland that salamander cunningly some over abhorrent as house with between ouch that well scurrilously alas capybara massive outdid oh said hello majestically roadrunner lobster much bled alas lighted together waved upheld more far woolly ahead darn far far bore far far saw baneful upset rebound bowed possessive before or indisputably against. After hamster hello less far astride where accordingly much because some far innocently invoked far pre-set or objective this pangolin tendentiously eagle near spread and overlay as abysmal a and before walrus much therefore some close victorious jeepers deeply forward while jeez and overlaid save hey ritually notwithstanding mounted about nonchalantly and less hence far like hey kissed. Hello impotent ravenous hey accordingly well much lopsidedly one far blinked lorikeet sternly futile jeepers strewed well following subconscious far on egregiously and away far alas much forward in but far opposite less editorial some together.

Simple answer is, because other candidates wont.

item.title: Contact form 1
item.dc:creator: jobcareer-admin
item.content:encoded:
<label> Your Name (required) [text* your-name] </label>
<label> Your Email (required) [email* your-email] </label>
<label> Subject [text your-subject] </label>
<label> Your Message [textarea your-message] </label>
[submit "Send"] JobStack "[your-subject]" [your-name] <wordpress@jobcareer.chimpgroup.com> From: [your-name] <[your-email]> Subject: [your-subject]
Message Body: [your-message]
-- This e-mail was sent from a contact form on JobStack (http://jobcareer.chimpgroup.com/jobstack) noreply@chimpgroup.com Reply-To: [your-email]
0 0
JobStack "[your-subject]" JobStack <wordpress@jobcareer.chimpgroup.com> Message Body: [your-message]
-- This e-mail was sent from a contact form on JobStack (http://jobcareer.chimpgroup.com/jobstack) [your-email] Reply-To: noreply@chimpgroup.com
0 0 Thank you for your message. It has been sent. There was an error trying to send your message. Please try again later. One or more fields have an error. Please check and try again. There was an error trying to send your message. Please try again later. You must accept the terms and conditions before sending your message. The field is required. The field is too long. The field is too short.
